name: The Fall Of Elements
description:
The Fall Of Elements draws you into the middle of a secret and ancestral struggle. A struggle for the ultimate power. A very old enemy of the Elements has resurfaced and you have been assigned to find and eliminate him.

In this vast dungeon that will put your sense of direction to the test, you will need all your thinking, your speed and your sense of timing to solve the various puzzles allowing you to progress.
Enemies from forbidden magic will try to eliminate you. Strike, defend and dodge at the right time by analyzing your opponents' attacks. Your composure will be more important than your weapons and your power to get you out of these fights alive.

The Fall Of Elements is a first-person game, with an old school component and is intended for players who love a challenge. As you go through The Fall Of Elements, you'll learn about the LORE of the game: the magic of the Elements, the power of the link, and the great catastrophe.
